home.major: Hi There, I Am Hai Tran

projects.title: Falcon platform
projects.short: A lightweight & high performance e-commercial platform.
description: Techs used: Django, GraphQL, VueJS, Docker
I created fast & reliable front-end with VueJS, and strong back-end based on Saleor
Using GraphQL middleware instead of RESTful API

projects.title: Gaming VPN App
projects.short: A VPN app for mobile gaming. Providing faster connection and reducing ping.
description: Techs used: Java (Android), C/C++, Python (Flask, Django), OpenVPN, Docker, Firebase
Set up multiple VPN servers and developed a client app

projects.title: Vietnamese Text Detection and Recognition
description: Achieved a state-of-the-art result in detecting and recognizing Vietnamese text in natural environment.

projects.title: Factory automation software
projects.short: Monitoring and control manually or automatically factory's devices.
description: Full-stack responsible for this project at Koidra AI
Developed a monitor and alert system
Developed control dashboard as a website

careers.title: Data Analyst Internship
blocks: Developed algorithms to find feature important & user interests in the real estate domain
Developed end-to-end system that automatically pulls data from Google Analytics, analyses & reports continuously

careers.title: Machine Learning Engineer
blocks: Started working at Koidra right after I graduated
Developed the end-to-end prediction systems for finance problems such as customer churn prediction, house-rent price prediction
Developed the automation system & dashboard for greenhouse & factory control
Key achievement: We took 3rd place at Autonomous Greenhouses International Challenge 2019 over 21 international teams

careers.title: Indie developer, freelancer
blocks: Due to the Coronavirus pandemic, I've decided to work at home to protect myself and took a rest. Focus on my self-project research.
I am also available for Freelance jobs.

education.major: University of Information Technology, VNU HCMC
blocks: Qualified in & joined Honors Program in Computer Science
Learnt data structures, algorithms, optimization, OOP, etc
Specialized in Computer Vision, learnt Machine learning & Deep learning techniques
Graduation thesis is a research to detect and recognize Vietnamese scene text using Deep learning techniques
Data analysis, and software development are also my hobbies

content: Understanding of design, training, testing, and validating model
Able to work with PyTorch, Tensorflow, Light-GBM
Able to analyse structure or non-structure data to find importance and user's interests
Familiar with Pandas, Numpy, PowerBI, Grafana, etc
Able to design database and table relationship
Familiar with MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB
My favorite task, optimizing the code for running faster with smaller resource
Able to reimplement program in C/C++ for higher performance in some situation, such as writing Python modules in Python Boost or Cython
Familiar with Django, Flask, Wordpress, Docker
Experienced in Linux, Nginx, Docker, and Rabbit-MQ.
Able to deploy onto Google Cloud, AWS, and Azure.
Familiar with Nuxt, VueJS
Able to work with Bootstrap, Node & Webpack
Good at HTML, CSS, and Javascript skill
Most experience is in Android app development
Able to work with Flutter (Dart), Objective-C, and Swift too
By observing the evolution of UI/UX since I was a kid, I am able to design the smart & high standards UI/UX
Able to develop .NET application especially Windows application
Most of my projects in college are written in C#
Able to learn new programming languages quickly as long as it is necessary for my projects
Comfortable with: Python, C#, C/C++, Javascript, PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS, Java, Objective-C

OS: Windows, Linux, and MacOS
IDEs: Pycharm, Visual Studio, PhpStorm, XCode, Android Studio
Design tools: Adoble Illutrator, Photoshop
